properties.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 3 at 8:21PM CST until January 3 at 11:15PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Flash Flood Warning for...
Central Lowndes County in northeastern Mississippi...

* Until 1115 PM CST.

* At 811 PM CST, emergency management reported Magby Creek
overflowing its banks into Masonic subdivision in eastern
Columbus. Home evacuations are currently taking place along Mason
and Curtis roads.

HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding from rising creek.

SOURCE...Emergency management.

IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of small creeks and
streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses
as well as other drainage and low lying areas.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Columbus.

Flood waters are moving down Magby Creek from western Alabama into
eastern Columbus. This will continue through late evening.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.

CMAMtext: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 11:15 PM CST. Avoid flooded areas.
